message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $10000 for it. I would like to make a counteroffer at $10000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
